dcterms:creator: Maja Buljana
Sebastian Padó
Jan Snajder
dcterms:description: A dataset created for evaluating compositional distributional semantic models (CDSMs) using lexical substitution tasks. It consists of 165 ANVAN (adjective-noun-verb-adjective-noun) phrases with 732 target words, each annotated with substitutes and confounders.
dcterms:title: ANVAN-LS Dataset

dcterms:creator: Gerhard Kremer
Katrin Erk
Sebastian Padó
Stefan Thater
dcterms:description: A corpus with manually annotated lexical substitution for all content words, providing substitutes for nouns, adjectives, verbs, and adverbs. It is used to construct the ANVAN-LS dataset.
dcterms:title: CoInCo Corpus

dcterms:creator: Various authors
dcterms:description: Large corpora used for building co-occurrence matrices. Includes ukWaC, BNC, and English Wikipedia. These are used to create vector space models for evaluating CDSMs.
dcterms:title: ukWaC, BNC, and English Wikipedia Corpora
